Title:
An Extension of Fault-Prone Filtering Using Precise
Training and a Dynamic Threshold
UseOF-SZZ: FP(buggy) lines and FIX lines are extracted from source code repositories based on an algorithm
Summary: a novel approach for detecting fault-prone modules using a spam-filtering technique, named Fault-Prone Filtering.
Outcome: The result of the experiment shows that our extension leads to twice the precision with about the same re- call, and improves 15% on the best F 1 measurement.
